Title: System8
Description: Experimental Silverlight project to help understand system 8's behavior (mehod of calibration bottom-quark tagging).
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Experimental Silverlight project to help understand system 8's behavior (mehod of calibration bottom-quark tagging).

Introduction
This is my attempt to use Sliverlight for something "sciency". We have calibration method that has 8 unkowns and 8 equations - and a bunch of assumptions that go into those equations. The code here is an attempt to build a tool that allows one to interactively explore System 8's behavior using Silverlight.

I'll put up a link when I get it served from somewhere.
